Copy-paste from discord

  1. Remove these lines
    Swerve9487-2025/src/main/java/frc/robot/RobotContainer.java at main · guizinxds/Swerve9487-2025 · GitHub
  2. Change the gearRatio to match what your modules gearRatio is supposed to be. The value is in Standard Conversion Factors here.
